text: This man's dog does not have a leash.
He is also looking at his phone and not paying attention to it.
Please put your dog on a leash, or leave this premise as your dog is dangrous to the native wildlife here.

name: Dude
text: I'm sorry! My bad, I was leaving right now, anyway, thank you for informing me.
He puts a leash on the dog and you see him out.
